patthana16.93:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.93:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.93:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
